name: Dice Crawler
description:
Hello there, average internet user, let me ask you a single question, if you could fight against your subconscious demons to get rid of them, would you do it?

Dice Crawler is an arcade and strategy single player game where you have to go through a world of dice. It has been developed with Godot for the GMTK game jam 2022. The theme of the jam was "roll of the dice". The gameplay relies on making the optimal play based in a control randomness in order to get through dungeons filled with dangers and treasure. It proposes to create a unique video game by mixing arcade, dungeons and strategy, creating new and unusual possibilities of having fun.
